t: Vernors - Wikipedia
s: March 30, 2025 - Vernors is an American brand of ginger ale owned by Keurig Dr Pepper that was first served in 1866 by James Vernor, a pharmacist from Detroit. Vernors is the oldest surviving ginger ale in the United States. According to the company, it was first served to the American public in 1866. Vernor opened a drugstore of his own in Detroit, Michigan, on Woodward Avenue, on the southwest corner of Clifford Street and sold his ginger soda ...
